markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 33 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 [Snowy Owl](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2505) **Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 7 **Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Erutaki](/Languages.aspx?ID=54) **Skills** [Astronomy Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +15, [Fortune-Telling Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +15, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +16, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +16, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +15, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +14, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +16 **Str** +0 **Dex** +1 **Con** +2 **Int** +1 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +4 **Items** hide clothing --- **AC** 21 **Fort** +11 **Ref** +10 **Will** +14 **HP** 60 **Immunities** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) **Ruun's Blessing** The presence of Ruun's soul merged with her own grants Snowy Owl immunity to cold. In addition, she no longer needs to eat or drink, but often chooses to do so out of habit or politeness.
Items hide clothing --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** fist +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning **Occult Prepared Spells** DC 18, attack +12 - **Cantrips (4th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Alarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=7), [Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) - **2nd** [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291), [Restoration](/Spells.aspx?ID=258) - **3rd** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Hypercognition](/Spells.aspx?ID=156), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) - **4th** [Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) **Ruun's Wings** ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Snowy Owl manifests a spectral pair of owl's wings that grant her a fly Speed of 25 feet. She can use this action again to hide her wings, which she often does when in mixed company in order to avoid drawing too much attention. If she falls, she can activate this ability as a reaction to immediately arrest her fall.
name: Snowy Owl
primary_source: Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires pg. 7

In addition, she no longer needs to eat or drink, but often chooses to do so out of habit or politeness. Items hide clothing --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action fist +12 (Agile, Finesse, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 1d4 bludgeoning Occult Prepared Spells DC 18, attack +12 - Cantrips (4th) Detect Magic, Guidance, Light, Read Aura, Shield - 1st Alarm, Bless, Soothe - 2nd Resist Energy, Soothe, Restoration - 3rd Dispel Magic, Hypercognition, Soothe - 4th Read Omens, Soothe Ruun's Wings Single Action (Conjuration, Occult) Snowy Owl manifests a spectral pair of owl's wings that grant her a fly Speed of 25 feet. She can use this action again to hide her wings, which she often does when in mixed company in order to avoid drawing too much attention. If she falls, she can activate this ability as a reaction to immediately arrest her fall.
